Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Humanoid
model.Player
public class Player
extends Humanoid

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Player()
    This constructor creates a Player with a default name, default HP, default HP maximum, default damages and a default resistance stat
